doc.field: 6624 Scénes et Types - La Danse du Ventre - Three young women, two playing instruments and one dancing. On the reverse is a stamp advertising Essences d'orient' owned by Charles Bey an importer of 'Pastilles du sérail' in Paris 8.9 x 13.9 cm
